Class BaseMod

java.lang.Object
  BaseMod
Direct Known Subclasses:
mod_Arrows, mod_Floodgate, mod_LightSensor
public abstract class BaseMod
extends java.lang.Object

Inherit this class in new mods for it to be used by ModLoader.

Version:
1.2.6
